trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cromwell
There were no other sightings in Cromwell on or around November 7th 1995
divs: Sighting DetailsThe UFO was hovering over the Connecticut River. Another person other than myself Sighted the UFO. The strange thing was I walked into my house to tell my wife to come outside to see the UFO and I did not tell her about the sighting because the other person and I did not remember seeing the UFO for two (2) weeks to the day. When the two weeks pased I asked the other person what did you see that night she said she did not want to talk about it!
